aboutpara: I am Om, Now building End to End prodcuts for clients. I got into tech at a young age, from breaking and installing custom Android OS's to learning ML and solving problems. I have a good grasp on Python with good debugging abilities and am well-versed in deep learning libraries like Tensorflow, PyTorch, and OpenCV.

resume.description: Well-versed with Deep Learning and Backend Frameworks in python with all popular databases.

experiences.bullets: Building Full Stack AI Products using GPT-4 Claude Azure API's for Clients with a group of friends. Working on many usecases in Fashion - Marketing- Architecture Industries.

Worked on open-source large language models (LLMs) for fine-tuning and prompt engineering as well as information retrieval using vector databases and LLMs from unstructured data. ,Developed customized OCR solutions for healthcare companies.

Developed new OCR models and pipelines for Indian languages and document analysis , Worked collaboratively with the Labeling Functions Spear & Decile resulting increase in performance. , Built single pipelines using trocr vision transformers and donut to replace the general OCR pipeline. , Developed & Deployed API's for Indian government projects using these models.

Collaborated with a team of 10 developer's to build Website & App for Alegira , Developed and tested Back-End APIs for a large-scale student festival website and mobile app , Demonstrated proficiency in SQL databases and Flask framework to build efficient and reliable Back- End API‚Äôs. , Added new features to alegria.co.in and Alegria app enhancing user experience and engagement.
Project ranging of max about 6 months ,Custom deep learning models, DL pipelines for all Media

achievements.e: IIIT Manthan Hackathon Finalist | Team Lead | IIIT Chattisgarh
